- Republican candidates for McDowell County sheriff answer questions on homelessness, ICE, drugs
- Sheriff: 5,000 grams of mushrooms, 6,000 grams of marijuana, 268 grams meth seized in operation
- McDowell Democrats march in solidarity with immigrants, against ICE
- High winds cause downed trees, power lines in McDowell County
- McDowell County manager says workforce board, chamber, NC Works responding to Baxter layoffs
- After crowd at Old Fort meeting, leaders are keeping trees in a downtown streetscape plan
- Marion man accused of stealing iPhone, selling it at Walmart kiosk
- Man charged with shooting into a McDowell County business while employees were inside
- Baxter reduces 3% of McDowell County plant's workforce; about 90 jobs eliminated
- Report: District Attorney Ted Bell cleared of misconduct; petition to remove dismissed
- North Carolina restaurant Kickback Jack's settles sex discrimination suit for $1.1M
- McDowell County Board of Commissioners to meet Monday. Here's what's on the agenda.
- Ingles in Swannanoa is getting an expansion, but Morganton store plans still not known
- Familiar Marion barbecue restaurant moves into Harvest Drive-In, grand opening Monday
- McDowell Academy for Innovation alum aims to share love of American history
